Player Drop!

Beware! Every time you die, you have a chance to drop something from your inventory!
It can be almost any item, even your armor, weapon and jewelry
There are different chances of item drop, by the cause of death
Death from monsters, clan wars, siege deaths, PK and PvP deaths are all treated differently
Augmented, epic jewelery and PvP items can be dropped as well!
Every time an item is dropped it has a chance to be broken into crystals!

Best of drop to you!
